fchen

Class InnerProductBasedVS

  • java.lang.Object
    • fchen.InnerProductBasedVS

  • public class InnerProductBasedVS
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a protocol that employs the string equality check approach to solve the cloud storage integrity checking problem. Please refer to our paper for the details of the protocol.
    Author:
    Chen, Fei (https://sites.google.com/site/chenfeiorange/), First draft on 04-11-2013. License: GNU GPL, Email: chenfeiorange@163.com

      Read the file data and initialize the protocol object

    • Method Detail

      • generateKey

        public void generateKey()
        Generate the key of the protocol.

      • outsource

        public void outsource()
        Outsource the data that is specified by the input file name. The tuples ( m_i, g^(r*m+f_i) ) are outsourced.

      • audit

        public ChallengeData audit(int challengeLen)
        Generate a challenge to audit the cloud.
        Returns:
        An object containing the indices and coefficients of the data blocks

      • auditDeterministic

        public java.lang.String auditDeterministic()
        Deterministic auditing: generate a key for the psedurandom generator.
        Returns:
        a key for the psedurandom generator.

      • verify

        public boolean verify(ChallengeData challenge,
             ProofData proof)
        Verify whether cloud's answer as in the 'proof' object is correct.
        Parameters:
        challenge - : An object containing the indices and coefficients of the challenged data blocks
        proof - : A proof object containing the inner product and its proof as defined in our paper
        Returns:
        true if the proof is correct; else false

      • verifyDeterministic

        public boolean verifyDeterministic(java.lang.String key,
                          ProofData proof)
        Verify whether cloud's proof is correct.
        Parameters:
        key - Key for a pseudorandom function to generate the secret challenge sequence.
        proof - A proof object returned by the cloud.
        Returns:
        true if the proof is correct; else false.

      • prove

        public ProofData prove(ChallengeData challenge)
        Generate the proof data on receiving an auditing challenge. The cloud computes \sum and \product shadow_i ^ s_i
        Parameters:
        -
        Returns:

      • proveDeterministic

        public ProofData proveDeterministic(java.lang.String key)
        Generate the proof data on receiving an deterministic auditing challenge. The cloud computes \sum and \product shadow_i ^ s_i from i = 0 to i = data_length - 1
        Parameters:
        -
        Returns:
